column1: #Text=Sokka says : " Sneak attacks do n't count !
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey , do n't get too comfortable .
#Text=It 's risky for us to stay in one place for very long .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sure we 'll be fine .
#Text=Besides , did you see how happy I 'm making this town ?
#Text=They 're even cleaning up that statue in my honor !
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , it 's nice to see you excited about being the Avatar .
#Text=I just hope it does n't all go to your head .
#Text=" Aang says : " Come on , you know me better than that .
#Text=" Painter says : " Hmmm ... Painting the Avatar ... that 's easy enough ... Oh , there 's another one ... Well , I 'll make an adjustment here , and ... There 's more ... well that ... "
